title: Winegrape Growing: Summer
description: Management of campus winegrape vineyards in the summer, including canopy manipulation; training; irrigation; crop evaluation; soil management; and disease, insect, vertebrate and weed management. 1 lecture, 1 laboratory.
prerequisites: FRSC/WVIT 231; BRAE 340; SS 221; PPSC 321; and STAT 218
